import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; function Viewreport() { const navi = useNavigate() const report = [ { id: 1, mine_id: "", date: "" }, { id: 2, mine_id: "", date: "" }, { id: 3, mine_id: "", date: "" }, ]; return ( <>
{report.map((item) => ( ))}
id mine_id date
{item.id} {item.mine_id} {item.date.slice(0, 10)}
) } export default Viewreport
